ðŸ“– Summary: Wren AI is an open-source GenBI agent that allows users to query databases using natural language. It generates SQL queries (Text-to-SQL), creates charts (Text-to-Chart), and provides AI-powered insights, aiming to simplify business intelligence tasks.
